mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.content AS "content", a.url AS "url", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
inner join sys_user u on u.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_message( id, title, content, url, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{url}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_message SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
